general_advisory: Rice: Drain out excess water from paddy field & regular surveillance work should be taken up in all crops. Sugarcane: Collect healthy setts for planting. Pisciculture: Treat white spot disease in fish. Animal Science: Provide minerals and adequate nutrition to animals.
